content.body: Dominic Farolino: there's also pre-removing steps. Should that be pre-remove steps then?

content.body: sideshowbarker: there's an open issue on standardizing [Reflect] and I think we're pretty close after the refactoring I did on reflection a while back, but not quite there yet
